attributes.action: Stop UK boarder agency from confiscating shoppers Vehicles comming from France
attributes.additional_details: The Uk boarder officers should not be able to confiscate shoppers cars coming from FRANCE they should allow EU ruling, you can buy and bring back as much  goods for your own personal use, Vehicle seizing, is to intimidate  Uk citizens shopping abroad. smugglers use Lorry's and containers, why should the ukba be a law to themselves. sign now you may want to buy in the EU and save money
